FuncDef: The display rip bfd session command displays information about BFD sessions. The display rip bfd session command displays information about BFD sessions.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about BFD sessions in a specified RIP process.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 4294967295.

Displays all information about BFD sessions in a specified RIP process.
-

Displays information about BFD sessions on the specified interface.
-

Displays information about BFD sessions on a neighbor with a specified ID.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.
